title: Noam Chomsky - Philosophies of Language & Politics Part 1
description:
Partner: Commonwealth Club
Location: The Commonwealth Club of California San Francisco, CA
Event Date: 10.06.2009
Speakers: Larry Bensky, Noam Chomsky

Summary: World-renowned intellectual Noam Chomsky has been pushing change in language, politics and culture for decades. The controversial expert on modern language explains why "the smart way to keep people passive and obedient is to strictly limit the spectrum of acceptable opinion, but allow very lively debate within that spectrum.
